text: It shall be possible to use application on Firefox 64 or higher.
author: jmocek

text: It shall be possible to use application on Chrome 71 or higher.
author: jmocek

text: It shall be possible to use application on Edge 44 or higher.
author: jmocek

text: It shall be possible to use application on IE 11 or higher.
author: jmocek

text: It shall be possible to install application on https://www.pythonanywhere.com/.
author: jmocek

text: Application should be delivered with predefined administrator account.
author: jmocek

text: It shall be possible to define user role. Available roles are: admin, user.
author: jmocek

text: It shall be possible to create an user account.
author: jmocek

text: Application should include 'Sing up' page.
author: jmocek

text: If an account is created then user pressed 'Submit' button.
author: jmocek

text: If an account is created then all text boxes are filled up.
author: jmocek

text: If an account is created then passed 'Username' does not exceed 60 characters.
author: jmocek

text: If an account is created then passed 'Username' is unique.
author: jmocek

text: If an account is created then passed 'Email' adress does not exceed 120 charactes.
author: jmocek

text: If an account is created then passed 'Email' address is unique.
author: jmocek

text: If an account is created then passed 'Password' matches 'Password confirmation'
author: jmocek

text: Password for each user should be stored as a hash.
author: jmocek

text: When an invalid username is passed OR invalid email is passed OR passed password and password confirmation does not match AND submit button is pressed then application shall point out which field is not filled up correctly.
author: jmocek

text: Application should include 'Log in' page.
author: jmocek

text: It shall be possible for user to log in.
author: jmocek

text: It shall be possible for administrator to log in.
author: jmocek

text: If user OR administrator is logged in then 'Log In' button was pressed.
author: jmocek

text: If an user OR administrator is logged in then passed username exist in database.
author: jmocek

text: When incorrect password OR incorrect username is passed to form AND 'Log in' button is pressed then an information that incorrect password or incorrect user was passed should be flashed on page.
author: jmocek

text: If an user OR administrator is logged in then passed password is correct.
author: jmocek

text: Login page should include 'Keep me logged in' checkbox.
author: jmocek

text: When an account is created then its data is stored in database.
author: jmocek

text: Application should include 'Add requirement' page.
author: jmocek

text: If a requirement is added to database then 'Submit' button was pressed.
author: jmocek

text: If a requirement is added to database then all required data was passed.
author: jmocek

text: If a requirement is added then its length does not exceed 1000 characters.
author: jmocek

text: If a requirement is added then passed product version is of type double.
author: jmocek

text: When passed 'Requirement text' exceeds 1000 characters then it should be pointed out by the application.
author: jmocek

text: When passed 'Product version' is nt of type double then it should be pointed out by the application.
author: jmocek

text: When requirement is added correctly then it should flashed by the application.
author: jmocek

text: Application should include 'Show requirements' page.
author: jmocek

text: Application should show requirements NID, Version, Text, Added and Product version of each requirement in Show requirements page.
author: jmocek

text: It shall be possible to edit existing requirement.
author: jmocek

text: If a requirement is edited in database then 'Submit' button was pressed.
author: jmocek

text: If a requirement is edited in database then all required data was passed.
author: jmocek

text: If a requirement is edited then its length does not exceed 1000 characters.
author: jmocek

text: If a requirement is edited then passed product version is of type double.
author: jmocek

text: It shall be possible to remove existing requirement.
author: jmocek

text: If a requirement is removed then it was confirmed by the user.
author: jmocek

text: Application should include 'My reqs' page.
author: jmocek

text: If a requirement is included in 'My reqs' page then its author is logged in.
author: jmocek

text: It shall be possible to export requirement database to csv file.
author: jmocek

text: It shall be possible to import database from CSV file.
author: jmocek

text: It shall be possible to log out from each page.
author: jmocek

text: If database is imported from CSV file then it is defined according to [ref1]
author: jmocek

text: Application should follow 'Application architecture' [ref2]
author: jmocek

text: It shall be possible to assign requirement to at least one product version.
author: jmocek

text: It shall be possible to create a requirements baseline.
author: jmocek

text: If a baseline is created then it consist of all requirements valid for chosen product version.
author: jmocek

text: Is shall be possible for the application to show baselines in 'Show requirements' page.
author: jmocek

text: If a baseline is created then 'baseline descritpion' is filled up.
author: jmocek

text: It shall be possible for an administrator to create requirements modules.
author: jmocek

text: It shall be possible to filter requirement in 'show requirements' page by author, creation date, module, product version and nid.
author: jmocek

text: If a requirement is removed then it is not visible in 'show requirements' page.
author: jmocek

text: If a requirement is edited then its previous version is not visible in 'Show requirements' page.
author: jmocek

text: It shall be possible to restore previous version of requirement from 'edit' page.
author: jmocek

text: When database is exported then the output file cointans data as shown in 'show requirements' page.
author: jmocek

text: It shall be possible for an administrator to attach submodels to existing modules/
author: jmocek

text: If new user is created then it is confirmed by the administrator.
author: jmocek

text: It shall be possible to search the database within 'show requirements'.
author: jmocek

text: If new requirement is created then its creation date is save in UTC time.
author: jmocek

text: If requirement is updated then its creation date is save in UTC time.
author: jmocek

text: When database is imported from CSV file then an author for each of imported requirement is set to current user.
author: jmocek

text: When database is imported from CSV file then creation time for each of imported requirements is set to current UTC time.
author: jmocek

text: Application should provide logs in human readable format.
author: jmocek

text: Application should log informations according to Log schema [ref.3]
author: jmocek

text: It shall be possible for an administrator to clear database.
author: jmocek

text: Application log file should be closed after each new line is added.
author: jmocek

text: Application database shall be handled with SQLite database management system.
author: jmocek
